anya-e0903n1:4_3: saṇhaṁ sukhumaṁ suññataṁ paccayākāradhammadesanaṁ patthayamānā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā bhagavantaṁ parivāretvā

anya-e0903n1:9_3: saṇhaṁ sukhumaṁ suññatapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ paccayākāradhammadesanaṁ patthayamānā bhagavantaṁ parivāretvā nisīdiṁsu.
anya-e0903n1:9_4: Tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ “paṭicca samuppādaṁ vo bhikkhave dedessāmi vibhajissāmi,
anya-e0903n1:11_0: Pucchā – pañcaverabhayasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:12_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ ārabbha “yato kho gahapati ariyasāvakassa pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti,
anya-e0903n1:12_3: ariyo cassa ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho,
anya-e0903n1:12_4: so ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṁ byākareyya khīṇanirayomi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto,
anya-e0903n1:12_5: sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti evaṁ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:13_1: kathañcāvusotattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa pañcannaṁ bhayānaṁ verānaṁ vūpasantatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n1:14_2: Yaṁ gahapati pāṇātipātī pāṇātipātapaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati,
anya-e0903n1:14_5: Pāṇātipātā ṭiviratassa evaṁ taṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ vūpasantaṁ hotī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa
anya-e0903n1:15_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgatatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n1:16_2: Idha gahapati ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti “itipiso bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho
anya-e0903n1:16_3: vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaropurisadammasārathi satthādevamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā”ti
anya-e0903n1:16_4: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgatatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n1:17_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakena ariyassa ñāyassa paññāya sudiṭṭhatā suppaṭividdhatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n1:18_1: katamo cassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho.
anya-e0903n1:18_2: Idha gahapati ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaññeva sādhukaṁ yoniso manasi karoti “iti imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti,
anya-e0903n1:18_6: yadidaṁ avijjāpaccayā (peyyāla) evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī”ti,
anya-e0903n1:18_7: evaṁ kho bhante bhagavatā tattha ariyasāvakena ariyassa ñāyassa paññāya sudiṭṭhatā suppaṭividdhatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n1:19_0: Yato kho gahapati ariyasāvakassa imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti.
anya-e0903n1:19_2: Ayañcassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho–
anya-e0903n1:21_0: Pucchā – dukkhasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:22_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dukkhassa bhikkhave samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:23_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā dukkhasamudayo pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:24_2: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0903n1:24_7: Sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ…pe…
anya-e0903n1:24_11: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0903n1:24_15: Ayaṁ kho bhikkhave dukkhassa samudayoti evaṁkho bhante tattha bhagavatā dukkhassa samudayo pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:25_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā dukkhassa atthaṅgamo pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:26_2: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0903n1:26_6: tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodhā upādānanirodho upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho,
anya-e0903n1:26_9: Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā dukkhassa atthaṅgamo pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:28_1: puttamaṁsūpamasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:29_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule adhunā pabbajite bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:29_2: Bhagavato ca bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahālābhasakkāro udapādi,
anya-e0903n1:29_3: ekacce ca bhante bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā kulaputtā āhāraṁ apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjiṁsu.
anya-e0903n1:29_4: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “cattārome bhikkhave āhārā bhūtānaṁ vā sattānaṁ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṁ vā anuggahāya.
anya-e0903n1:29_5: Katame cattāro kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā phasso dutiyo manosañcetanā tatiyā viññāṇaṁ catuttha”nti evaṁ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:30_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha kabaḷīkārassa āhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro bhagavatā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:31_1: seyyathāpi bhikkhave dve jāyampatikā parittaṁ sambalaṁ ādāya kantāramaggaṁ paṭipajjeyyuṁ.
anya-e0903n1:31_2: Tesamassa ekaputtako piyo manāpoti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā kabaḷīkārassa āhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:32_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā phassāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:33_1: seyyathāpi bhikkhave gāvī niccammā kuṭṭaṁ ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya,
anya-e0903n1:33_8: te naṁ khādeyyunti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā phassassa āhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro vitthāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:34_0: Evameva khvāhaṁ bhikkhave phassāhāro daṭṭhabboti vadāmi.
anya-e0903n1:35_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā manosañcetanāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:36_1: seyyathāpi bhikkhave aṅgārakāsu sādhikaporisā puṇṇā aṅgārānaṁ vītaccikānaṁ vītadhūmānaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:36_2: Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukha kāmo dukkhappaṭikūloti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0903n1:37_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā viññāṇāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:38_1: seyyathāpi bhikkhave coraṁ āgucāriṁ gahetvā rañño dasseyyuṁ “ayaṁ te devacoro āgucārī,
anya-e0903n1:38_3: taṁ daṇḍaṁ paṇehī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā viññāṇāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:40_2: sammāsambuddhena susimaparibbājaka suttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:41_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ susimaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:41_2: Āyasmā bhante susimo yāvatako bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ ahosi kathāsallāpo,
anya-e0903n1:41_5: pacchā nibbāne ñāṇa”nti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:42_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavā āyasmato susimattherassa sampatiarahattapattassa anuyogavasena paṭipucchitvā
anya-e0903n1:43_4: Evaṁ bhanteti evamādinā bhante bhagavā tattha āyasmato susimassa sampatiarahattapattassa uttaripi anuyogavasena
anya-e0903n1:44_0: Tassa me bhante bhagavā accayaṁ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṁsaṁvarāya–
anya-e0903n1:47_1: abhisamayasaṁyutte panāvuso paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ nakhasikhāsuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:48_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave,

anya-e0903n1:48_4: ayaṁ vā mahāpathavī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.

anya-e0903n1:52_3: kalyāṇādhimuttikā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samentī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:54_0: Pucchā – assaddhasaṁsandanasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:55_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dhātusova bhikkhave sattā saṁsandanti samenti,
anya-e0903n1:55_7: Duppaññā duppaññehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samentī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:58_1: anamataggasaṁyutte āvuso dutiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ pathavīsuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:59_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṁ bhikkhave saṁsāro,
anya-e0903n1:59_2: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
anya-e0903n1:59_3: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso imaṁ mahāpathaviṁ kolaṭṭhimattaṁ kolaṭṭhimattaṁ mattikāguḷikaṁ karitvā nikkhipeyya ‘ayaṁ me piyā,
anya-e0903n1:59_5: Apariyādinnāva bhikkhave tassa purisassa pitupitaro assu.
anya-e0903n1:59_9: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhā saṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ” evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.

anya-e0903n1:64_0: Pucchā – tatthāvuso tatiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ assusuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.

anya-e0903n1:65_4: yaṁ vā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udaka”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:67_1: tatthāvuso chaṭṭhaṁ saṁgītaṁ sāsapasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:68_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:68_2: Aññataro bhante bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “kīvadīgho nu kho bhante kappo”ti.
anya-e0903n1:68_3: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “dīgho kho bhikkhu kappo,
anya-e0903n1:68_4: so na sukaro saṅkhātuṁ ettakāni vassāni itivā,
anya-e0903n1:68_5: (peyyāla) ettakāni vassasatasahassāni itivāti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:70_2: sammāsambuddhena anamataggasaṁyutte gaṅgāsuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:71_1: rājagahe bhante aññataraṁ brāhmaṇaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:72_0: Bahukā nu kho bho gotama kappā abbhatītā atikkantā”ti.
anya-e0903n1:72_1: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “bahukā kho brāhmaṇa kappā abbhatītā atikkantā,
anya-e0903n1:72_2: te na sukarā saṅkhātuṁ ‘ettakā kappā’ iti vā ‘ettakāni kappasatāni’ iti vā ‘ettakāni kappasahassāni’
anya-e0903n1:72_3: itivā ‘ettakāni kappasatasahassāni’ iti vā”ti eva mādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:74_0: Pucchā – puggalasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:75_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṁ bhikkhave saṁsāro,
anya-e0903n1:75_2: pubbākoṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
anya-e0903n1:75_3: Ekapuggalassa bhikkhave kappaṁ sandhāvato saṁsarato siyā evaṁ mahā aṭṭhikaṅkalo aṭṭhipuñjo aṭṭhirāsi,
anya-e0903n1:75_6: sambhatañca na vinassetyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:77_0: Pucchā – tatthāvuso duggatasuttañca sukhitasuttañca bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.

anya-e0903n1:78_2: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
anya-e0903n1:78_4: niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ ‘amhehipi evarūpaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ iminā dīghena addhunā’ti,

anya-e0903n1:81_0: Pucchā – tiṁsamattasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.

anya-e0903n1:82_6: yaṁ vā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udaka”nti evamādinā bhavagatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:84_0: Pucchā – mātusuttādīni panāvuso chasuttāni bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:85_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṁ bhikkhave saṁsāro,
anya-e0903n1:85_2: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
anya-e0903n1:85_4: yo na mātābhūtapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā.
anya-e0903n1:85_9: Yo na dhītābhūtapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:88_0: Pucchā – kassapasaṁyutte panāvuso candūpamasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:89_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “candūpamā bhikkhave kulāni upasaṅkamatha apakasseva kāyaṁ apakassa cittaṁ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā.
anya-e0903n1:89_2: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso jarudapānaṁ vā olokeyya pabbatavisamaṁ vā nadīviduggaṁ vā apakasseva kāyaṁ apakassa cittaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:89_3: Evameva kho bhikkhave candūpamā kulāni upasaṅkamatha apakasseva kāyaṁ apakassa cittaṁ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:90_0: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave, kathaṁ rūpā bhikkhu arahati kulāni upasaṅkamituṁ.
anya-e0903n1:91_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā parisuddhāparisuddha dhammadesanaṁ dassetvā bhikkhūnaṁ ovādo dinno.

anya-e0903n1:92_3: kathaṁ rūpassa bhikkhuno parisuddhā dhammadesanā hotī”ti evamādinā parisuddhāparisuddhadhammadesanā vitthārato
anya-e0903n1:92_4: dassetvā “kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso,

anya-e0903n1:92_6: Evaṁ kho bhante bhagavato bhikkhūnaṁ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0903n1:93_0: Yo hi koci bhikkhave bhikkhu evaṁcitto paresaṁ dhammaṁ deseti “aho vata me dhammaṁ suṇeyyuṁ,
anya-e0903n1:94_0: Svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehi passiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhi–
anya-e0903n1:95_0: Kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso,
anya-e0903n1:95_1: ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabbaṁ–
anya-e0903n1:97_2: sammāsambuddhena kassapasaṁyutte catutthaṁ kulūpakasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:98_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n1:98_2: kathaṁ rūpo bhikkhu arahati kulūpako hotuṁ,
anya-e0903n1:98_3: kathaṁ rūpo bhikkhu na arahati kulūpako hotu”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:99_0: Kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso,
anya-e0903n1:99_1: ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabbaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:101_0: Pucchā – tatthevāvuso bhagavatā dutiya ovādasuttaṁ kattha kena saddhiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:102_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmatā mahākassapena saddhiṁ “ovada kassapa bhikkhū,
anya-e0903n1:102_3: ahaṁ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṁ tvaṁ vā,
anya-e0903n1:102_4: ahaṁ vā bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiṁ kathaṁ kareyyaṁ tvaṁ vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:103_0: Yassa kassaci bhante saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu,
anya-e0903n1:105_0: Pucchā – tatthevāvuso bhagavatā tatiyaovādasuttaṁ kattha kena saddhiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:106_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmatāyeva mahākassapena saddhiṁ “ovada kassapa bhikkhū.
anya-e0903n1:106_3: ahaṁ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṁ tvaṁ vā.
anya-e0903n1:106_4: Ahaṁ vā bhikkhūnaṁ dhammaṁ kathaṁ kareyyaṁ tvaṁ vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:107_0: Dubbacā kho bhante etarahi bhikkhū dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatā akkhamā appadakkhiṇaggāhino anusāsaniṁ–
anya-e0903n1:109_1: tatthevāvuso bhagavatā pariyosānaṁ saddhammappatirūpakasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:110_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁyeva mahākassapaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:110_2: Āyasmā bhante mahākassapo bhagavantaṁ etadevoca “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0903n1:110_3: yena pubbe appatarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni ahesuṁ,
anya-e0903n1:110_5: Ko pana bhante hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0903n1:110_6: yenetarahi bahutarāni ceva sakkhāpadāni appatarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantī”ti.
anya-e0903n1:110_7: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “evañcetaṁ kassapa hoti sattesu hāyamānesu saddhamme antaradhāyamāne bahutarāniceva sikkhāpadāni honti,
anya-e0903n1:110_8: appatarāca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:113_2: sammāsambuddhena lābhasakkāraṁyutte pañcamaṁ saṁgītaṁ mīḷhakasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:114_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
anya-e0903n1:114_2: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave mīḷhakā gūthādī gūthapūrā puṇṇā gūthassa,
anya-e0903n1:114_4: sā tena aññā mīḷhakā atimaññeyya “ahamhi gūthādī gūthapūrā puṇṇā gūthassa,
anya-e0903n1:114_5: purato ca myāyaṁ mahāgūthapuñjo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:115_0: Taṁ hi tassa bhikkhave moghapurisassa hoti dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
anya-e0903n1:117_2: na ca no uppanno lābhasakkārasiloko cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassabhī”ti,
anya-e0903n1:119_1: tattho āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakehi saṁgītaṁ ekaputtakasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbhaṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:120_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya,
anya-e0903n1:120_2: saddhā bhikkhave upāsikā ekaputtakaṁ piyaṁ manāpaṁ evaṁ sammāāyācamānā āyāceyya tādiso tāta bhavāhi,
anya-e0903n1:120_3: yādiso citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:121_0: Esā bhikkhave tulā etaṁ pamāṇaṁ mama sāvakānaṁ upāsakānaṁ yadidaṁ citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako.
anya-e0903n1:122_0: Sace kho tvaṁ tāta agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajasi, tādiso tāta bhavāhi, yādisā sāriputtamoggallānā.
anya-e0903n1:123_0: Mā ca kho tvaṁ tāta sekhaṁ appattamānasaṁ lābhasakkārasiloko anupāpuṇātu–
anya-e0903n1:124_0: Evaṁ dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
anya-e0903n1:126_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāyakehi saṁgītaṁ ekadhītusuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:127_1: sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
anya-e0903n1:127_2: Saddhā bhikkhave upāsikā ekaṁ dhītaraṁ piyaṁ manāpaṁ evaṁ sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya ‘tādisā ayye bhavāhi,
anya-e0903n1:127_3: yādisā khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā’ti.
anya-e0903n1:127_4: Esā bhikkhave tulā etaṁ pamāṇaṁ mama sāvikānaṁ upāsikānaṁ,
anya-e0903n1:127_5: yadidaṁ khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:128_0: Sace kho tvaṁ ayye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajasi,
anya-e0903n1:128_2: yādisā khemā ca bhikkhunī uppalavaṇṇā ca–
anya-e0903n1:131_0: Pucchā – rāhulasaṁyuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:132_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ rāhulaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:132_2: Āyasmā bhante rāhulo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṁkhittena dhammaṁ desetu,
anya-e0903n1:132_3: yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyya”nti,
anya-e0903n1:132_4: tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “taṁ kiṁ maññasi rāhula,
anya-e0903n1:132_14: No hetaṁ bhante”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:135_1: lakkhaṇasaṁyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakattherehi paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ aṭṭhisuttaṁ bhagavatā
anya-e0903n1:135_2: kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:136_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṁ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:136_2: Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavatā sammukhe āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca “idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno
anya-e0903n1:136_3: gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṁ padese sitaṁ pātvākāsi,
anya-e0903n1:136_4: ko nu kho āvuso moggallāna hetu,
anya-e0903n1:136_6: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno “idhāhaṁ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ”ti evamādinā ārocesi.
anya-e0903n1:136_7: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti,
anya-e0903n1:136_9: yatrahi nāma sāvako evarūpaṁ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṁ vā karissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:137_0: Acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho;
anya-e0903n1:140_2: sammāsambuddhena lakkhaṇasaṁyutte tatiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ piṇḍasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:141_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṁ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:141_2: Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhaggavato sammukhe āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca “idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno
anya-e0903n1:141_3: gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṁ padese sitaṁ pātvākāsi,
anya-e0903n1:141_6: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno “idhāhaṁ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ maṁsapiṇḍaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ,
anya-e0903n1:141_7: tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
anya-e0903n1:141_8: Sā sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karotī”ti evamādinā ārocesi.
anya-e0903n1:141_9: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti,
anya-e0903n1:141_11: yatrahi nāma sāvako evarūpaṁ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṁ vā karissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:143_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakehi mahātherehi saṁgītaṁ asilomasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:144_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṁ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:144_2: Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca “ko nu kho āvuso moggallāna hetu,
anya-e0903n1:144_4: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallānatthero “idhāhaṁ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ asilomaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ”ti evamādinā ārocesi.
anya-e0903n1:144_5: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti,
anya-e0903n1:144_7: (Peyyāla) eso bhikkhave satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sūkariko ahosī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:146_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi saṁgītaṁ sūcilomasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:147_1: tattheva bhante rājagahe āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṁ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:147_2: Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe tatheva avoca.
anya-e0903n1:148_0: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno tatheva ārocesi.
anya-e0903n1:148_1: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti,
anya-e0903n1:148_3: (peyyāla) eso bhikkhave satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sūto ahosī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitā.
anya-e0903n1:150_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi saṁgītāni pāpabhikkhusuttādīni pañcasuttāni bhagavatā
anya-e0903n1:150_2: kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n1:151_1: rājagahe āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṁ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṁ ārabbha bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n1:151_2: Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe pubbe vuttanayeneva ārocesi.
anya-e0903n1:151_3: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno “idhāhaṁ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ bhikkhuṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:151_12: sā sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karotī”ti evamādinā ārocesi.
anya-e0903n1:151_13: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti.
anya-e0903n1:151_15: Eso bhikkhave bhikkhu kassapassasammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpabhikkhu ahosi.
anya-e0903n1:151_16: Esā bhikkhave bhikkhunī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpabhikkhunī ahosi.
anya-e0903n1:151_17: Esā bhikkhave sikkhamānā kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasikkhamānā ahosi.
anya-e0903n1:151_18: Eso bhikkhave sāmaṇero kassapassasammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇero ahosi.
anya-e0903n1:151_19: Esā bhikkhave sāmaṇerī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇerī ahosī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n1:154_1: opammasaṁyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi saṁgītaṁ nakhasikhasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:155_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n1:155_3: yo cāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito,
anya-e0903n1:155_4: yā cāyaṁ mahāpathavī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:156_0: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave, katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ.
anya-e0903n1:159_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi saṁgītaṁ āṇisuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:160_1: sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṁ bhikkhave dasārahānaṁ ānako nāma mudiṅgo ahosi,
anya-e0903n1:160_2: tassa dasārahā ānake ghaṭite aññaṁ āṇiṁ odahiṁsu,
anya-e0903n1:160_3: ahu kho so bhikkhave samayo yaṁ ānakassa mudiṅgassa porāṇaṁ pokkharaphalakaṁ antaradhāyi,
anya-e0903n1:163_0: Pucchā – bhikkhusaṁyutte āvuso bhagavatā navasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:164_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ navaṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:164_2: Aññataro bhante navo bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṁ pavisitvā apposukko tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyabhi,
anya-e0903n1:164_3: na bhikkhūnaṁ veyyāvaccaṁ karoti cīvarakārasamaye tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “mā kho tumhe bhikkhave etassa
anya-e0903n1:164_4: bhikkhuno ujjhāyitthā eso kho bhikkhave bhikkhu catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhamma sukhavihārānaṁ
anya-e0903n1:164_5: nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:165_0: Ahampi kho bhante sakaṁ kiccaṁ karomi,
anya-e0903n1:166_0: Eso kho bhikkhave bhikkhu catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī –
anya-e0903n1:170_0: Dhāreti antimaṁ dehaṁ, jetvā māraṁ savāhiniṁ–
